description:
In August we're hosting a night of talks about testing!

- A Travesty of a Mockery of a...
  Dave Marshall, Software Sapper and Technical Manager at Childcare

A whirlwind tour of test doubles, what they are, how you can use them, when you should use them.

- Is TDD dead? A cheeky guide to phpspec
  Marek Matulka, Software Engineer at SensioLabsUK

A look at phpspec and why it could be an alternative to phpunit.

--

MixRadio have kindly offered to host the evening at their office, and provide drinks and pizza. Don't forget to check them out- and if you're looking, they are hiring.

Afterwards we'll head to the pub, The Apple if it's sunny, Horts if it's not!

--

View on the PHPSW website

location.address: Prudential Buildings, 11-19 Wine St., Bristol, BS1 2PH, Bristol

title: Testing
